articles.author: Qaanitah Hunter
articles.title: ‘They’ll be back’: White Afrikaners leave South Africa to be refugees in US - Al Jazeera
articles.description: Trump administration welcomes first batch of white Afrikaners while US cuts off refugee programmes to other countries.
articles.content:
Johannesburg, South Africa On a chilly Sunday evening in Johannesburg, OR Tambo International Airport was filled with tourists and travellers entering and exiting South Africas busiest airport.
